title: Unable to connect to the login que
body: on my main account I keeps saying unable to connect to login que. I even went on 3 different computers to see if it was my pc that was the problem. But I can't even connect to to this site with my main account? Can anyone help me?

replies.body: Are you still having this issue.  There was a 5 hour downtime for maintenance overnight, but is resolved now.  Be sure to bookmark our [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page to stay up to date on service, and let me know if this is still an issue.
